quote_first: He already felt drunk enough at the thought of being with Sunny. He glanced at his watch.
quote_last: . He loosened his tie,  dark yellow with a muted pattern and unbuttoned the top button of his blue shirt.
title: It All Began in Monte Carlo
author: Elizabeth Adler
